comment: Version of ~ exdistrv with a disjoint variable condition on ` x , y ` not requiring ~ ax-11 . (The same can be done with ~ eeeanv and ~ ee4anv .) (Contributed by BJ, 29-Sep-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
